queries.query: mass of tiny creatures that reside in urban areas and can spread disease
queries.variant: swarm of small animals that live in city places and spread sickness

queries.query: vermin swarm that attacks in enclosed spaces and is resistant to physical damage
queries.variant: rat swarm that fights in tight areas and can withstand physical hits

queries.query: agile rats that can occupy the same space as a target and have keen senses
queries.variant: quick rats that can fit in the same area as a victim and have sharp senses

queries.query: creature that overwhelms enemies with bites and is commonly found in sewers
queries.variant: monster that floods foes with bites and is often seen in drainage systems

queries.query: small swarm of beasts that is a nuisance and can inflict piercing damage
queries.variant: tiny horde of creatures that is bothersome and can deal stabbing damage
